info.title: SermonAudio API
info.description:
## Overview

This is the autogenerated documentation for the SermonAudio API.

To get started, see our [API Programming Guide](/#API_Programming_Guide). It
introduces the API, discusses key endpoints, and includes details about authentication.

sermonID.title: Sermonid
sermonID.description: The unique sermon ID, can be used to retrieve the sermon individually using /sermons/{sermon_id}

fullTitle.title: Fulltitle
fullTitle.description: The full-length title of the sermon. Use this only when space is not a concern, as this may be rather long.

displayTitle.title: Displaytitle
displayTitle.description: The short title of the sermon. The short title is most commonly displayed, so the “long” title is designated fullTitle

languageCode.title: Languagecode
languageCode.description: The ISO 639 code for the sermon’s language.

languageCode3.title: Languagecode3
languageCode3.description: The ISO 639-3 code for the sermon’s language.

bibleText.title: Bibletext
bibleText.description: The scripture reference(s) with books spelled out in English and multiple scriptures separated by semicolon (;).

subtitle.title: Subtitle
subtitle.description: either designate a sermon subtitle, or as a series designation

moreInfoText.title: Moreinfotext
moreInfoText.description: Additional descriptive info or notes about the sermon.

eventType.title: Eventtype
eventType.description: The type of event where the sermon was preached (use GET /filter_options/sermon_event_types to get a list of these event types).

broadcaster.title: Broadcaster
broadcaster.description: The broadcaster that uploaded the sermon.

speaker.title: Speaker
speaker.description: The (primary) speaker that preached the sermon.

downloadCount.title: Downloadcount
downloadCount.description: The number of times this sermon has been downloaded, expressed as a round number such as 0 or 20 for display purposes.

preachDate.title: Preachdate
preachDate.description: The date that this sermon was preached.

pickDate.title: Pickdate
pickDate.description: The date that this sermon was selected as a staff pick.

lastAudioAccessTimestamp.title: Lastaudioaccesstimestamp
lastAudioAccessTimestamp.description: Last time the audio for this sermon was played.

BibleBookFilterOption.title: BibleBookFilterOption
BibleBookFilterOption.description: Represents a Bible book with chapters used in sermons.

feed_link_id.title: Feed Link Id
feed_link_id.description: The id for the feed link

link.title: Link
link.description: If present, the URL isupdated, but if not, a new link is added.

podcast_enabled.title: Podcast Enabled
podcast_enabled.description: If true, the series has a podcast

podcast_email.title: Podcast Email
podcast_email.description: The email for the series podcast

podcast_speaker.title: Podcast Speaker
podcast_speaker.description: The speaker for the series podcast

disablePodcast.title: Disablepodcast
disablePodcast.description: If true, the podcast will be disabled

includeEmailInPodcast.title: Includeemailinpodcast
includeEmailInPodcast.description: If true, the broadcaster includes email in podcast

welcomeVideoID.title: Welcomevideoid
welcomeVideoID.description: The welcome video id for the broadcaster

new_series_name.title: New Series Name
new_series_name.description: The name for the new series

defaultSortBy.description: The default for how sermons in the series should be sorted

podcastEnabled.title: Podcastenabled
podcastEnabled.description: If true, the series has a podcast

podcastEmail.title: Podcastemail
podcastEmail.description: The email for the series podcast

podcastSpeaker.title: Podcastspeaker
podcastSpeaker.description: The speaker for the series podcast

sermonID.title: Sermonid
sermonID.description: The id for the sermon if the media is a sermon

fullTitle.title: Fulltitle
fullTitle.description: The full title, max length is 85 characters

publishTimestamp.title: Publishtimestamp
publishTimestamp.description: The timestamp the sermon was published

displayTitle.title: Displaytitle
displayTitle.description: The title that is displayed, max length is 30 characters

subtitle.title: Subtitle
subtitle.description: The subtitle for the sermon, max length is 30 characters.

preachDate.title: Preachdate
preachDate.description: The date the sermon was preached

eventType.title: Eventtype
eventType.description: The type of event (ex. Sunday Service)

bibleText.title: Bibletext
bibleText.description: The bible text for a sermon

moreInfoText.title: Moreinfotext
moreInfoText.description: The extra information for the sermon

languageCode.title: Languagecode
languageCode.description: The ISO 639 language code for the sermon

sortOrder.description: The sort order for the broadcaster's highlighted sermon listing

audioType.description: The audio input type for the broadcaster

audioSermonID.title: Audiosermonid
audioSermonID.description: The sermon id for the highlighted sermon, if audioType is `sermon_id`

audioEventType.description: The event type for the highlighted sermon, if audioType is `event_type`

title.title: Title
title.description: The name for the new series

defaultSortBy.description: The default for how sermons in the series should be sorted

podcastEnabled.title: Podcastenabled
podcastEnabled.description: If true, the series has a podcast

podcastEmail.title: Podcastemail
podcastEmail.description: The email for the series podcast

podcastSpeaker.title: Podcastspeaker
podcastSpeaker.description: The speaker for the series podcast

publishNow.title: Publishnow
publishNow.description: is a boolean and indicates that you want to publish something right now.

publishDate.title: Publishdate
publishDate.description: deprecated and will be removed in API v3

languageCode.title: Languagecode
languageCode.description: The ISO 639 language code for the sermon

moreInfoText.title: Moreinfotext
moreInfoText.description: The extra information for the sermon

broadcasterID.title: Broadcasterid
broadcasterID.description: The broadcaster for the new series

title.title: Title
title.description: The name for the new series

defaultSortBy.description: The default for how sermons in the series should be sorted

podcastEnabled.title: Podcastenabled
podcastEnabled.description: If true, the series has a podcast

podcastEmail.title: Podcastemail
podcastEmail.description: The email for the series podcast

podcastSpeaker.title: Podcastspeaker
podcastSpeaker.description: The speaker for the series podcast

fullTitle.title: Fulltitle
fullTitle.description: The full title, max length is 85 characters

displayTitle.title: Displaytitle
displayTitle.description: The title that is displayed, max length is 30 characters

subtitle.title: Subtitle
subtitle.description: The subtitle for the sermon, max length is 30 characters.

publishTimestamp.title: Publishtimestamp
publishTimestamp.description: The timestamp the sermon was published

preachDate.title: Preachdate
preachDate.description: The date the sermon was preached

eventType.title: Eventtype
eventType.description: The type of event (ex. Sunday Service)

moreInfoText.title: Moreinfotext
moreInfoText.description: The extra information for the sermon

languageCode.title: Languagecode
languageCode.description: The ISO 639 language code for the sermon

bibleText.title: Bibletext
bibleText.description: The bible text for the sermon

displayName.title: Displayname
displayName.description: The broadcaster’s full-length name (appropriate for most devices).

location.title: Location
location.description: A verbal description of the location (i.e. Greenville, South Carolina).

minister.title: Minister
minister.description: The name of the primary speaking minister.

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: The broadcaster’s latitude (useful for displaying on maps)

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: The broadcaster’s longitude (useful for displaying on maps)

imageURL.title: Imageurl
imageURL.description: The rectangular image for the broadcaster.

denomination.title: Denomination
denomination.description: The denomination of the broadcaster (usually an abbreviation).

webcastInProgress.title: Webcastinprogress
webcastInProgress.description: Indicates if a webcast is currently in progress for the broadcaster.

aboutUs.title: Aboutus
aboutUs.description: An informational blurb about the broadcaster. NOTE: May contain HTML.

address.title: Address
address.description: The physical address for the broadcaster.

addressMail.title: Addressmail
addressMail.description: The mailing address for the broadcaster.

country.title: Country
country.description: The English name of the broadcaster’s country.

facebookUsername.title: Facebookusername
facebookUsername.description: The Facebook username for the broadcaster, this is useful to link to a broadcaster’s Facebook page.

twitterUsername.title: Twitterusername
twitterUsername.description: The Twitter username for the broadcaster, this is useful to link to a broadcaster’s Twitter page.

albumArtURL.title: Albumarturl
albumArtURL.description: The square album art URL format for this broadcaster.

bibleVersion.title: Bibleversion
bibleVersion.description: The canonical abbreviation for the broadcaster’s preferred translation. Primarily used for display purposes.

serviceTimesArePreformatted.title: Servicetimesarepreformatted
serviceTimesArePreformatted.description: Indicates if the broadcaster has added formatting to serviceTimes field.

serviceTimes.title: Servicetimes
serviceTimes.description: A free-form description of service times of a broadcaster.

serviceTimesList.title: Servicetimeslist
serviceTimesList.description: A list of service times of a broadcaster.

canWebcast.title: Canwebcast
canWebcast.description: Indicates if a broacaster has webcasting enabled on their account.

listenLineNumber.title: Listenlinenumber
listenLineNumber.description: The broadcaster’s listen line phone number.

vacantPulpit.title: Vacantpulpit
vacantPulpit.description: Indicates if the broadcaster is currently seeking a minister.

BroadcasterContactInfo.title: BroadcasterContactInfo
BroadcasterContactInfo.description: Fields related to contact info for a broadcaster.

BroadcasterFilterOptions.title: BroadcasterFilterOptions
BroadcasterFilterOptions.description: A set of filters for a broadcaster.

BroadcasterNearLocation.title: BroadcasterNearLocation
BroadcasterNearLocation.description: Encapsulates a Broadcaster and distance from location.

CaptionMedia.title: CaptionMedia
CaptionMedia.description:
A Media object. This represents any time of media served via the
API (e.g., Sermon audio or video file, Webcast).

live.title: Live
live.description: Indicates if the media is a live broadcast (e.g., a webcast).

bitrate.title: Bitrate
bitrate.description: The bitrate of the media in kbps, if known. When displaying this information client-side, values >= 1000 should be displayed in megabits with 1 digit after the decimal point (for example, “1.0Mbps”).

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: The duration of the media in seconds, if known.

audioCodec.description: The audio codec for the media (especially useful for video containers), if known.

DisplayArticleSearchResult.title: DisplayArticleSearchResult
DisplayArticleSearchResult.description: Minimum information for a list of articles.

EventType.title: EventType
EventType.description: This is the event at which a sermon was preached (ex. Sunday AM).

description.title: Description
description.description: The event type's description. This value is used in the `eventType` filter for the `/sermons/` endpoint.

FilterOptionsSermonCounts.title: FilterOptionsSermonCounts
FilterOptionsSermonCounts.description:
Sermon counts per broadcaster for that broadcaster's
speakers. This count is on a per-broadcaster basis, while the
sermon_count in the Speaker object is across all broadcasters.

HighlightedSortOrders.title: HighlightedSortOrders
HighlightedSortOrders.description: Valid sort orders for home/welcome/start page's sermons.

displayName.title: Displayname
displayName.description: The broadcaster’s full-length name (appropriate for most devices).

location.title: Location
location.description: A verbal description of the location (i.e. Greenville, South Carolina).

minister.title: Minister
minister.description: The name of the primary speaking minister.

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: The broadcaster’s latitude (useful for displaying on maps)

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: The broadcaster’s longitude (useful for displaying on maps)

imageURL.title: Imageurl
imageURL.description: The rectangular image for the broadcaster.

denomination.title: Denomination
denomination.description: The denomination of the broadcaster (usually an abbreviation).

webcastInProgress.title: Webcastinprogress
webcastInProgress.description: Indicates if a webcast is currently in progress for the broadcaster.

aboutUs.title: Aboutus
aboutUs.description: An informational blurb about the broadcaster. NOTE: May contain HTML.

LiteContainedBroadcaster.title: LiteContainedBroadcaster
LiteContainedBroadcaster.description: Minimum broadcaster information contained in LiteSermon object.

LiteSermon.title: LiteSermon
LiteSermon.description:
Lite Sermon data model.

Provides the minimal amount of information to display a sermon,
designed to be as lightweight as possible and give the best database
performance.

sermonID.title: Sermonid
sermonID.description: The unique sermon ID, can be used to retrieve the sermon individually using /sermons/{sermon_id}

fullTitle.title: Fulltitle
fullTitle.description: The full-length title of the sermon. Use this only when space is not a concern, as this may be rather long.

displayTitle.title: Displaytitle
displayTitle.description: The short title of the sermon. The short title is most commonly displayed, so the “long” title is designated fullTitle

languageCode.title: Languagecode
languageCode.description: The ISO 639 code for the sermon’s language.

languageCode3.title: Languagecode3
languageCode3.description: The ISO 639-3 code for the sermon’s language.

bibleText.title: Bibletext
bibleText.description: The scripture reference(s) with books spelled out in English and multiple scriptures separated by semicolon (;).

subtitle.title: Subtitle
subtitle.description: either designate a sermon subtitle, or as a series designation

moreInfoText.title: Moreinfotext
moreInfoText.description: Additional descriptive info or notes about the sermon.

eventType.title: Eventtype
eventType.description: The type of event where the sermon was preached (use GET /filter_options/sermon_event_types to get a list of these event types).

broadcaster.title: Broadcaster
broadcaster.description: The broadcaster that uploaded the sermon.

speaker.title: Speaker
speaker.description: The (primary) speaker that preached the sermon.

downloadCount.title: Downloadcount
downloadCount.description: The number of times this sermon has been downloaded, expressed as a round number such as 0 or 20 for display purposes.

preachDate.title: Preachdate
preachDate.description: The date that this sermon was preached.

pickDate.title: Pickdate
pickDate.description: The date that this sermon was selected as a staff pick.

lastAudioAccessTimestamp.title: Lastaudioaccesstimestamp
lastAudioAccessTimestamp.description: Last time the audio for this sermon was played.

LiteSermonSpeaker.title: LiteSermonSpeaker
LiteSermonSpeaker.description: Minimum speaker information contained in LiteSermon object.

displayName.title: Displayname
displayName.description: The speaker’s display name. NOTE: this currently doubles as the speakerID / speakerName when used in other URLs.

portraitURL.title: Portraiturl
portraitURL.description: The rectangular, portrait-style image of the speaker that would be used, for example, on a speaker detail page.

albumArtURL.title: Albumarturl
albumArtURL.description: The large, square, stylized speaker image that is used for player album art.

roundedThumbnailImageURL.title: Roundedthumbnailimageurl
roundedThumbnailImageURL.description: The small, rounded thumbnail images that would be used, for example, in a mobile app list view.

Media.title: Media
Media.description:
A Media object. This represents any time of media served via the
API (e.g., Sermon audio or video file, Webcast).

mediaType.description: MediaType represents an concrete type of media (with each value being a file extension).

live.title: Live
live.description: Indicates if the media is a live broadcast (e.g., a webcast).

streamURL.title: Streamurl
streamURL.description: The URL to be used when streaming media online. For most clients, this URL should always be used to listen to media.

downloadURL.title: Downloadurl
downloadURL.description: The URL to be used when downloading media for long-term storage or offline-listening.

bitrate.title: Bitrate
bitrate.description: The bitrate of the media in kbps, if known. When displaying this information client-side, values >= 1000 should be displayed in megabits with 1 digit after the decimal point (for example, “1.0Mbps”).

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: The duration of the media in seconds, if known.

audioCodec.description: The audio codec for the media (especially useful for video containers), if known.

MediaSet.title: MediaSet
MediaSet.description:
A set of media objects arranged based on content type.

Provides information about media available for a sermon, which can
include audio, video, and text (such as PDF). Each component list is
sorted in order of highest-to-lowest bitrate. There is no guarantee that a
particular sermon contains any particular type of media.

audio.title: Audio
audio.description: A list of zero or more audio elements associated with the Sermon or Webcast

video.title: Video
video.description: A list of zero or more video elements associated with the Sermon or Webcast.

text.title: Text
text.description: A list of zero or more text files associated with the Sermon or Webcast

MediaType.title: MediaType
MediaType.description: MediaType represents an concrete type of media (with each value being a file extension).

SearchBibleReference.title: SearchBibleReference
SearchBibleReference.description:
A Bible reference for search results.

Fields should be compatible with BibleBookStructureInfo. We are not
using SermonBibleReference because it doesn't have the right field
names nor the right access levels for fields (all of the numerical
fields are optional).

SeriesPodcastLinkType.title: SeriesPodcastLinkType
SeriesPodcastLinkType.description: The type of a series podcast link. Must be no more than 16 positions.

sermonID.title: Sermonid
sermonID.description: The unique sermon ID, can be used to retrieve the sermon individually using /sermons/{sermon_id}

fullTitle.title: Fulltitle
fullTitle.description: The full-length title of the sermon. Use this only when space is not a concern, as this may be rather long.

displayTitle.title: Displaytitle
displayTitle.description: The short title of the sermon. The short title is most commonly displayed, so the “long” title is designated fullTitle

languageCode3.description: The ISO 639-3 code for the sermon’s language.

subtitle.description: either designate a sermon subtitle, or as a series designation

eventType.description: The type of event where the sermon was preached (use GET /filter_options/sermon_event_types to get a list of these event types).

broadcaster.description: The broadcaster that uploaded the sermon.

speaker.title: Speaker
speaker.description: The (primary) speaker that preached the sermon.

downloadCount.title: Downloadcount
downloadCount.description: The number of times this sermon has been downloaded, expressed as a round number such as 0 or 20 for display purposes.

preachDate.title: Preachdate
preachDate.description: The date that this sermon was preached.

pickDate.title: Pickdate
pickDate.description: The date that this sermon was selected as a staff pick.

lastAudioAccessTimestamp.title: Lastaudioaccesstimestamp
lastAudioAccessTimestamp.description: Last time the audio for this sermon was played.

SermonSort.title: SermonSort
SermonSort.description: Ways to order sermon listing results

SoloStatus.title: SoloStatus
SoloStatus.description: The status of a solo site

displayName.title: Displayname
displayName.description: The speaker’s display name. NOTE: this currently doubles as the speakerID / speakerName when used in other URLs.

portraitURL.title: Portraiturl
portraitURL.description: The rectangular, portrait-style image of the speaker that would be used, for example, on a speaker detail page.

albumArtURL.title: Albumarturl
albumArtURL.description: The large, square, stylized speaker image that is used for player album art.

roundedThumbnailImageURL.title: Roundedthumbnailimageurl
roundedThumbnailImageURL.description: The small, rounded thumbnail images that would be used, for example, in a mobile app list view.

sortName.title: Sortname
sortName.description: A last name, first name variant of the speaker’s name designed for efficient sorting.

mostRecentPreachDate.title: Mostrecentpreachdate
mostRecentPreachDate.description: The date that a speaker last preached.

TextMedia.title: TextMedia
TextMedia.description:
A Media object. This represents any time of media served via the
API (e.g., Sermon audio or video file, Webcast).

live.title: Live

bitrate.title: Bitrate
bitrate.description: The bitrate of the media in kbps, if known. When displaying this information client-side, values >= 1000 should be displayed in megabits with 1 digit after the decimal point (for example, “1.0Mbps”).

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: The duration of the media in seconds, if known.

audioCodec.description: The audio codec for the media (especially useful for video containers), if known.

Webcast.title: Webcast
Webcast.description: Basic metadata about a webcast that is currently in progress

WebcastCodec.title: WebcastCodec
WebcastCodec.description: "The audio codec (especially useful for video containers), if known.

WebcastEventType.title: WebcastEventType
WebcastEventType.description:
These codes are used in the saWebcastEvents WebcastEventType column.
If changes made, update transcoding project in webcast-transcoding/transcode/constants.py

WebcastLite.title: WebcastLite
WebcastLite.description: The bare-bones info apps need in resource-constrained environments to build their UI.

audioStreamURL.title: Audiostreamurl
audioStreamURL.description: Audio stream URL for webcast, containing only most recent minute or so of media

videoStreamURL.title: Videostreamurl
videoStreamURL.description: Video stream URL for webcast, containing only most recent minute or so of media

broadcasterAlbumArtURL.title: Broadcasteralbumarturl
broadcasterAlbumArtURL.description: The square album art URL format for this broadcaster.

eventStreamURL.title: Eventstreamurl
eventStreamURL.description: URL to access full video stream for webcast

audioEventStreamURL.title: Audioeventstreamurl
audioEventStreamURL.description: URL to access full audio stream for webcast

WebcastOriginalStreamInfo.title: WebcastOriginalStreamInfo
WebcastOriginalStreamInfo.description: Info about the stream the broadcaster pushed.

WebcastRangeTotals.title: WebcastRangeTotals
WebcastRangeTotals.description: The node glue that wraps node API responses

get.description: Returns a list of sources near a `latitude`/`longitude` location.

parameters.name: meters

schema.title: Meters
schema.description: The max meters away from the lat, long to search

parameters.description: The max meters away from the lat, long to search

parameters.name: lite

schema.title: Lite
schema.description: If true, lite broadcasters returned

parameters.description: If true, lite broadcasters returned

get.description:
Returns information for the first broadcaster with the given `broadcaster_id`

If no broadcaster exists with the specified `broadcaster_id` returns a response with a 404 status.

parameters.name: lite

schema.title: Lite
schema.description: if true, a lite broadcaster is returned

parameters.description: if true, a lite broadcaster is returned

schema.title: Response Broadcaster Info V2 Node Broadcasters  Broadcaster Id  Get

404.description: No broadcaster exists with the specified `broadcaster_id`

patch.description:
Patch broadcaster login for `broadcaster_id`

If no broadcaster exists with the specified `broadcaster_id` returns a response with a 404 status.

404.description: No broadcaster exists with the specified `broadcaster_id`

get.description: Return all series for a `broadcaster_id` in standard paginated format.

parameters.name: sort_by

schema.description: The sort order for the series

parameters.description: The sort order for the series

parameters.name: page

schema.title: Page
schema.description: The page to load

parameters.description: The page to load

post.description:
Create a new series for a `broadcasterid`.

DEPRECATED: Use POST /v2/node/series instead.

get.description:
Gets the speakers for a `broadcaster_id`.

DEPRECATION NOTICE:

THIS ENDPOINT IS SLATED FOR REMOVAL ONCE WE UPDATE THE APP
Get the series for `series_id_or_name` for a `broadcaster_id`.

delete.description:
Deletes a series for a broadcaster, by `series_id_or_name`

A series may have zero sermons, so series are only deleted explicitly.

If no series exists with the specified `series_id_or_name` returns a response with a 404 status.

DEPRECATED: Use DELETE /v2/node/series/{series_id}

404.description: No series exists with the specified `series_id_or_name`

patch.description:
Patch a series.

Allows renaming a broadcaster's series, as well as updating certain other series attributes.

The series must exist to be renamed. The rename is based on the
`broadcaster_id` and `series_id_or_name`, so a broadcaster can't
rename another broadcaster's series.

This is one of two endpoints that update series fields. This updates only the fields specified here.

DEPRECATED. Use PATCH /v2/node/series/{series_id} instead.

post.description:
Create or update a podcast link.

This endpoint does an upsert: The URL is the only part
of the feed link which can be updated.

If no series exists with the specified `series_id` returns a response with a 404 status.

DEPRECATED: Use PATCH /node/series/{series_id} to manage feed links

schema.title: Response Broadcaster Create Podcast Link V2 Node Broadcasters  Broadcaster Id  Series  Series Id Or Name  Podcast Link Post

404.description: No series exists with the specified `series_id`

delete.description:
Deletes a podcast feed link for a series.

If no series exists with the specified `series_id_or_name` returns a response with a 404 status.
If no feed link exists with the specified `feed_id` returns a response with a 404 status.

DEPRECATED: Use PATCH /node/series/{series_id} to manage feed links

404.description: No series or feed link with the specified `series_id_or_name` or `feed_id`

patch.description:
Patch metadata fields in a series.

This is one of two endpoints that update series fields. This updates only the fields specified here.

If no series exists with the specified `series_id_or_name` returns a response with a 404 status.

DEPRECATED. Use PATCH /v2/node/series/{series_id} instead.

404.description: No series exists with the specified `series_id_or_name`

and are not themselves deleted.

delete.description:
Deletes the sermon with `sermon_id`.

Also deletes all child sermons (a sermon with a parent_sermon_id of `sermon_id`)

Update the sermon.

The order of publish* arguments indicates their precedence.

If no sermon exists with the specified `sermon_id` returns a response with a 404 status.

post.description: Creates and returns a sermon for a broadcaster

get.description:
Returns a list of sermons that match the provided criteria.

`sortBy` options include the following:
- downloads - total downloads, descending
- newest (date preached, descending)
- newest-published (date published, descending)
- oldest (date preached, ascending)
- series (series title, ascending)
- speaker (speaker name, ascending)
- commentcount (number of comments, descending)

get.description:
Super-lite webcast in progress count.

uses the current user to bubble followed webcasts to the
top. Returns only an integer count, without a model object wrapper.
